structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - COUNCIL MEETINGS AND PROCEDURE
Sec. 1-1024. - COMPENSATION AND ALLOWANCES OF THE MAYOR AND MEMBERS OF THE COUNCIL.

law.catch_line: COMPENSATION AND ALLOWANCES OF THE MAYOR AND MEMBERS OF THE COUNCIL.

text.section: The Mayor shall be paid a salary of sixteen thousand dollars ($16,000.00) annually in monthly payments of one thousand three hundred thirty-three dollars and thirty-three cents ($1,333.33) with actual travel expenses paid through voucher request and shall be paid an additional sum of one hundred dollars ($100.00) per month, and said sum shall be an allowance for in-City expenses.

The Mayor Pro Tem shall be paid a salary of thirteen thousand dollars ($13,000.00) annually in monthly payments of one thousand eighty-three dollars and thirty-three cents ($1,083.33) with actual travel expenses paid through voucher request.

The remaining Council members shall be paid a salary of eleven thousand dollars ($11,000.00) annually in monthly payments of nine hundred sixteen dollars and sixty-seven cents ($916.67) with actual travel expenses paid through voucher request.

All Council members shall be paid an additional sum of one hundred fifty dollars ($150.00) per month, and said sum shall be an allowance for auto travel. Council members are eligible to participate in the City's health and dental plans and may choose to have a cell phone allowance of up to forty-two dollars ($42.00) per month. Council members shall receive a salary increase of one thousand dollars ($1,000.00) annually for four (4) fiscal years beginning July 1, 2013. (Code 1959 , §2-3.1; Ord. No. 1987-576A, §§1—3, 6-18-87; Ord. No. 1990-468, §§1—3, 1-2-90; Ord. No. 2012-69, §1, 6-18-12, eff. 7-1-12) State law references: Authority of Mayor and Council to establish levels of compensation, G.S. 160-64.
